entities.name: cattermole
entities.description: Mrs. Cattermole is mentioned as someone whose sobs mask Harry's footsteps.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is making his way carefully towards the steps.

entities.name: patronus cat
entities.description: The Patronus cat is a magical creature that patrols a certain place.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as the owner of the Patronus cat and is described as being happy in her element.

relationships.description: Harry's footsteps are masked by Mrs. Cattermole's sobs.
The Patronus cat is Umbridge's, and it glows brightly because she is happy here.
